code: import React from'react';import TradingViewWidget from'../TradingViewWidget';import SimpleOrderBook from'../SimpleOrderBook';import NewsWidget from'../NewsWidget';import FundamentalsWidget from'../FundamentalsWidget';import PortfolioWidget from'../PortfolioWidget';import RiskWidget from'../RiskWidget';import LeaderboardWidget from'../Gamification/Leaderboard';import ChallengesWidget from'../Gamification/Challenges';import VoiceAssistant from'../AI/VoiceAssistant';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function WidgetFactory(_ref){let{type,symbol,onSymbolChange}=_ref;switch(type){case'chart':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TradingViewWidget,{symbol:symbol,onSymbolChange:onSymbolChange});case'orderbook':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SimpleOrderBook,{symbol:symbol});case'news':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewsWidget,{symbol:symbol});case'fundamentals':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FundamentalsWidget,{symbol:symbol});case'portfolio':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioWidget,{});case'risk':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RiskWidget,{});case'leaderboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeaderboardWidget,{});case'challenges':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChallengesWidget,{});case'voice':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VoiceAssistant,{});case'sectors':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"widget",children:"\uD83C\uDFED Sectors Widget (Coming Soon)"});case'esg':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"widget",children:"\uD83C\uDF31 ESG Metrics (Coming Soon)"});case'dividends':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"widget",children:"\uD83D\uDCB0 Dividend Tracker (Coming Soon)"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"widget unknown-widget",children:["Unknown widget type: ",type]});}}
